Eugène Rutagarama bụ onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi si Rwanda

Enyere ya ihe nrite "Goldman Environmental Prize" na 2001, maka mbọ ya na-azọpụta ndị bi na ugwu gorillas na Volcanoes National Park na Virungas ugwu, n'oge agha na-adịbeghị anya esemokwu na Democratic Republic of Congo.

Kemgbe 2001, Rutagarama anọwo na-agbasi mbọ ike na mbọ nchekwa ya, na-enye aka na nkwado nke atụmatụ mmekorita zuru ụwa ọnụ iji chebe Central Albertine Rift, mpaghara ama ama maka ahịhịa na anụmanụ dị iche iche, gụnyere ebe obibi nke gorilla ugwu Virunga
Eugène nwekwara ọkwá dị elu na Wildlife Conservation Society, Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund's Karisoke Research Center, na ụlọ ọrụ ogige ntụrụndụ mba Rwanda, biputere agha 1994 na mgbukpọ
Ugbu a, Eugène na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ nchekwa nchekwa dị elu na Wild Earth Allies, ebe ọ na-elekwasị anya na ichekwa ebe obibi gorilla site na ịkwalite mmepe obodo
Afọ abụọ ka e nyechara ya ihe nrite Goldman, Rutagarama weghaara ọkwa onye isi otu International Gorilla Conservation Programme (IGCP)
Ọ jere ozi n'ọrụ a afọ itoolu
Na 2012, a họpụtara Rutagarama dị ka onye ndụmọdụ nka na ụzụ na Greater Virunga Transboundary Collaboration, otu gọọmentị etiti nke DR Congo, Rwanda, na Uganda guzobere site na enyemaka nke IGCP.
